form.link.reset-password: Please click here if you forgot your password

errors.trial-left-days: Your trial period will expire in {{trial}} day(s).
errors.trial-ended: Trial period has expired. Please login and complete the registration to continue.
errors.authentication: URL, user ID or password is incorrect. If you are unable to log in, please contact the administrator.

errors.update-failed: Error! Your password has not been updated.

messages.info1: An email for resetting your password will be sent to your email address.
messages.suggest-info1: Your password must follow the following conditions.
messages.suggest-info2: Password is valid for 90 days since being set.
messages.suggest-info3: Password must be between 8 and 32 characters.
messages.suggest-info4: Password must contain at least two of the following character types: half-width letters, half-width numbers, and half-width symbols.
messages.suggest-info5: Password must be different from your email.
messages.expired-message:
Your password has expired.
Please set a new password to continue.

change.password-thesame-employee-id: Password must be different from Employee’s ID.
change.password-upto-three: Last 3 passwords must not be reused.

change-finish.info:
Password has been changed.
Please log in again from the login page.

newPassword.Pattern: Password must contain at least two of the following character types: half-width letters, half-width numbers, and half-width symbols.
newPassword.Size: Password must be between 8 and 32 characters.

init.info1: We have sent you a confirmation email for changing your password.
init.info2: Please reset password from the email you received.
init.info3: If you do not receive the email within 5 minutes, please contact the system administrator.

messages.info: An email for resetting your password will be sent to your mail address.

finish.info2: Please change your password from the login page.

popup.destination.title: Confirm connection destination
popup.destination.message: Please select a target feature to connect after logging in.

tenant.contract-info.title: [Important] Environmental Suspension
tenant.contract-info.content4: To learn more about the reason, please login to the contractor's site.

licenses.error-licenses.message: License is insufficent. Please contact the administrator.
